pages.text: Training $(thing)Innervation$() is really only done in one way: kill things.$(br)Every time you successfully kill a monster or creature, you'll gain some experience from the combat. The amount gained will depend on the creature slain, and how hard it was for you to kill it.
pages.title: Training Methods

pages.text: You will also gain xp by utilising the various abilities the $(thing)Innervation$() skill gives you access to, so make sure to get familiar with your new powers and put them to use!
